Types

Operation = object
  id*: EntityId
  case kind*: OperationKind
  of RemoveEntity:
    nil
  of AddComponents:
    addersById*: Table[ComponentId, Adder]
  of RemoveComponents:
    compIdsToRemove*: PackedSet[ComponentId]
Source   Edit   
OperationKind = enum
  RemoveEntity, AddComponents, RemoveComponents
